goalLocation - the goal location is passed so that we can plan a route to it
Method Detail

plan

public static java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> plan(rp.warehouse.pc.data.Robot robot,
                                                      rp.warehouse.pc.data.Location goalLocation)
A static method returning a queue of integers, representing commands for route execution to understand

Parameters:
robot - the robot is passed so that we can pass it the overloaded constructor to access its current coordinates to plan its route
goalLocation - the goal location is passed so that we can plan a route to it
Returns:
we return 'plan' - a queue of integer route instructions for RouteExecution to understand

planDropOff

public static java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> planDropOff(rp.warehouse.pc.data.Robot robot)
A method to return a queue of integers (commands) on how to reach the next drop off point.

Parameters:
robot - The robot is passed so that we know its current location, in order to plan the route for the next drop off point
Returns:
we return 'plan' - a queue of integer route instructions for RouteExecution to understand

getVisitedList

public java.util.ArrayList<rp.warehouse.pc.data.Location> getVisitedList()
A method to return the array list of visited locations

Returns:
we return the array list of visited locations

run

public void run()
This method basically calls all the methods methods to plan all the next coordinated to visit to arrive at the goal location These locations are converted into commands that RouteExecution understands

addToList

public void addToList(rp.warehouse.pc.route.RoutePlanLocation location)
A method to add each of the north, east, south, and west locations to the 'toVisitList' array list, if it is valid. This method also checks if the location passed is the goal location, in which case we break the loop in the run method. However, this is done after checking the validity of the location, so that it is added to the 'toVisitList' array list before we break the loop.

Parameters:
location -

isValid

public boolean isValid(rp.warehouse.pc.route.RoutePlanLocation location)
A method to check if the location checked is valid or not. If valid, we may consider it for the next move, as we put it in the 'toVisitList' array list.

Parameters:
location - The location being tested on its validity.
Returns:
We return true if the location is valid, and false otherwise.

isGoal

public boolean isGoal(rp.warehouse.pc.data.Location location)
A method to check if the location passed is the goal location.

Parameters:
location - The location being checked.
Returns:
We return true if this location is the goal location, and false otherwise.

visitCheapestLocationBasedOnPathCost

public void visitCheapestLocationBasedOnPathCost(int prevX,
                                                 int prevY)
A method to move to the cheapest-cost valid location available.

Parameters:
prevX - This is the previous location's x coordinate
prevY - This is the previous location's y coordinate
